item.title: Death toll from floods and landslides on Indonesia's Sumatra rises to 174
item.description: The death toll from flash floods and landslides on Indonesia's Sumatra island Friday rose to 174 on Friday with 79 people missing, authorities said.
item.content:encoded:
The death toll from flash floods and landslides on Indonesia's Sumatra island Friday rose to 174 on Friday with 79 people missing, authorities said.

item.title: Father and daughter reflect on how they became a family
